00075 static void do_nla_region_buttons(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg), int event)
00076 {
00077     //Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00078     
00079     switch(event) {
00080 
00081     }
00082     
00083     /* default for now */
00084     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00085     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00086 }
00087 
00088 static int nla_panel_context(const bContext *C, PointerRNA *adt_ptr, PointerRNA *nlt_ptr, PointerRNA *strip_ptr)
00089 {
00090     bAnimContext ac;
00091     bAnimListElem *ale= NULL;
00092     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00093     short found=0;
00094     int filter;
00095     
00096     /* for now, only draw if we could init the anim-context info (necessary for all animation-related tools) 
00097      * to work correctly is able to be correctly retrieved. There's no point showing empty panels?
00098      */
00099     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0) 
00100         return 0;
00101     
00102     /* extract list of active channel(s), of which we should only take the first one 
00103      *  - we need the channels flag to get the active AnimData block when there are no NLA Tracks
00104      */
00105     // XXX: double-check active!
00106     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE|ANIMFILTER_LIST_VISIBLE|ANIMFILTER_ACTIVE|ANIMFILTER_LIST_CHANNELS);
00107     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
00108     
00109     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00110         switch (ale->type) {
00111             case ANIMTYPE_NLATRACK: /* NLA Track - The primary data type which should get caught */
00112             {
00113                 NlaTrack *nlt= (NlaTrack *)ale->data;
00114                 AnimData *adt= ale->adt;
00115                 
00116                 /* found it, now set the pointers */
00117                 if (adt_ptr) {
00118                     /* AnimData pointer */
00119                     RNA_pointer_create(ale->id, &RNA_AnimData, adt, adt_ptr);
00120                 }
00121                 if (nlt_ptr) {
00122                     /* NLA-Track pointer */
00123                     RNA_pointer_create(ale->id, &RNA_NlaTrack, nlt, nlt_ptr);
00124                 }
00125                 if (strip_ptr) {
00126                     /* NLA-Strip pointer */
00127                     NlaStrip *strip= BKE_nlastrip_find_active(nlt);
00128                     RNA_pointer_create(ale->id, &RNA_NlaStrip, strip, strip_ptr);
00129                 }
00130                 
00131                 found= 1;
00132             }
00133                 break;
00134                 
00135             case ANIMTYPE_SCENE:    /* Top-Level Widgets doubling up as datablocks */
00136             case ANIMTYPE_OBJECT:
00137             case ANIMTYPE_FILLACTD: /* Action Expander */
00138             case ANIMTYPE_DSMAT:    /* Datablock AnimData Expanders */
00139             case ANIMTYPE_DSLAM:
00140             case ANIMTYPE_DSCAM:
00141             case ANIMTYPE_DSCUR:
00142             case ANIMTYPE_DSSKEY:
00143             case ANIMTYPE_DSWOR:
00144             case ANIMTYPE_DSNTREE:
00145             case ANIMTYPE_DSPART:
00146             case ANIMTYPE_DSMBALL:
00147             case ANIMTYPE_DSARM:
00148             case ANIMTYPE_DSSPK:
00149             {
00150                 /* for these channels, we only do AnimData */
00151                 if (ale->id && ale->adt) {
00152                     if (adt_ptr) {
00153                         /* AnimData pointer */
00154                         RNA_pointer_create(ale->id, &RNA_AnimData, ale->adt, adt_ptr);
00155                         
00156                         /* set found status to -1, since setting to 1 would break the loop 
00157                          * and potentially skip an active NLA-Track in some cases...
00158                          */
00159                         found= -1;
00160                     }
00161                 }
00162             }   
00163                 break;
00164         }
00165         
00166         if (found > 0)
00167             break;
00168     }
00169     
00170     /* free temp data */
00171     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00172     
00173     return found;
00174 }

00178 {
00179     return nla_panel_context(C, NULL, NULL);
00180 }

00183 static int nla_animdata_panel_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00184 {
00185     PointerRNA ptr;
00186     return (nla_panel_context(C, &ptr, NULL, NULL) && (ptr.data != NULL));
00187 }

00189 static int nla_track_panel_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00190 {
00191     PointerRNA ptr;
00192     return (nla_panel_context(C, NULL, &ptr, NULL) && (ptr.data != NULL));
00193 }

00195 static int nla_strip_panel_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00196 {
00197     PointerRNA ptr;
00198     return (nla_panel_context(C, NULL, NULL, &ptr) && (ptr.data != NULL));
00199 }
00200 
00201 static int nla_strip_actclip_panel_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00202 {
00203     PointerRNA ptr;
00204     NlaStrip *strip;
00205     
00206     if (!nla_panel_context(C, NULL, NULL, &ptr))
00207         return 0;
00208     if (ptr.data == NULL)
00209         return 0;
00210     
00211     strip= ptr.data;
00212     return (strip->type == NLASTRIP_TYPE_CLIP);
00213 }
00214 
00215 static int nla_strip_eval_panel_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00216 {
00217     PointerRNA ptr;
00218     NlaStrip *strip;
00219     
00220     if (!nla_panel_context(C, NULL, NULL, &ptr))
00221         return 0;
00222     if (ptr.data == NULL)
00223         return 0;
00224     
00225     strip= ptr.data;
00226     
00227     if (strip->type == NLASTRIP_TYPE_SOUND)
00228         return 0;
00229         
00230     return 1;
00231 }

00235 /* active AnimData */
00236 static void nla_panel_animdata (const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00237 {
00238     PointerRNA adt_ptr;
00239     /* AnimData *adt; */
00240     uiLayout *layout= pa->layout;
00241     uiLayout *row;
00242     uiBlock *block;
00243     
00244     /* check context and also validity of pointer */
00245     if (!nla_panel_context(C, &adt_ptr, NULL, NULL))
00246         return;
00247 
00248     /* adt= adt_ptr.data; */
00249     
00250     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00251     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_nla_region_buttons, NULL);
00252     
00253     /* Active Action Properties ------------------------------------- */
00254     /* action */
00255     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00256         uiTemplateID(row, (bContext *)C, &adt_ptr, "action", "ACTION_OT_new", NULL, NULL /*"ACTION_OT_unlink"*/); // XXX: need to make these operators
00257     
00258     /* extrapolation */
00259     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00260         uiItemR(row, &adt_ptr, "action_extrapolation", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00261     
00262     /* blending */
00263     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00264         uiItemR(row, &adt_ptr, "action_blend_type", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00265         
00266     /* influence */
00267     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00268         uiItemR(row, &adt_ptr, "action_influence", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00269 }

00271 /* active NLA-Track */
00272 static void nla_panel_track (const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00273 {
00274     PointerRNA nlt_ptr;
00275     uiLayout *layout= pa->layout;
00276     uiLayout *row;
00277     uiBlock *block;
00278     
00279     /* check context and also validity of pointer */
00280     if (!nla_panel_context(C, NULL, &nlt_ptr, NULL))
00281         return;
00282     
00283     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00284     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_nla_region_buttons, NULL);
00285     
00286     /* Info - Active NLA-Context:Track ----------------------  */
00287     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00288         uiItemR(row, &nlt_ptr, "name", 0, NULL, ICON_NLA);
00289 }
00290 
00291 /* generic settings for active NLA-Strip */
00292 static void nla_panel_properties(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00293 {
00294     PointerRNA strip_ptr;
00295     uiLayout *layout= pa->layout;
00296     uiLayout *column, *row, *sub;
00297     uiBlock *block;
00298     short showEvalProps = 1;
00299     
00300     if (!nla_panel_context(C, NULL, NULL, &strip_ptr))
00301         return;
00302     
00303     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00304     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_nla_region_buttons, NULL);
00305     
00306     /* Strip Properties ------------------------------------- */
00307     /* strip type */
00308     row= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00309         uiItemR(row, &strip_ptr, "name", 0, NULL, ICON_NLA); // XXX icon?
00310         uiItemR(row, &strip_ptr, "type", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00311     
00312     /* strip extents */
00313     column= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00314         uiItemL(column, "Strip Extents:", ICON_NONE);
00315         uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "frame_start", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00316         uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "frame_end", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00317     
00318     /* Evaluation-Related Strip Properties ------------------ */
00319     
00320     /* sound properties strips don't have these settings */
00321     if (RNA_enum_get(&strip_ptr, "type") == NLASTRIP_TYPE_SOUND)
00322         showEvalProps = 0;
00323     
00324     /* only show if allowed to... */
00325     if (showEvalProps) {
00326         /* extrapolation */
00327         row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00328             uiItemR(row, &strip_ptr, "extrapolation", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00329         
00330         /* blending */
00331         row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00332             uiItemR(row, &strip_ptr, "blend_type", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00333             
00334         /* blend in/out + autoblending
00335          *  - blend in/out can only be set when autoblending is off
00336          */
00337         column= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00338             uiLayoutSetActive(column, RNA_boolean_get(&strip_ptr, "use_animated_influence")==0); 
00339             uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "use_auto_blend", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE); // XXX as toggle?
00340             
00341             sub= uiLayoutColumn(column, 1);
00342                 uiLayoutSetActive(sub, RNA_boolean_get(&strip_ptr, "use_auto_blend")==0); 
00343                 uiItemR(sub, &strip_ptr, "blend_in", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00344                 uiItemR(sub, &strip_ptr, "blend_out", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00345             
00346         /* settings */
00347         column= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00348             uiLayoutSetActive(column, !(RNA_boolean_get(&strip_ptr, "use_animated_influence") || RNA_boolean_get(&strip_ptr, "use_animated_time"))); 
00349             uiItemL(column, "Playback Settings:", ICON_NONE);
00350             uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "mute", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00351             uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "use_reverse", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00352     }
00353 }

00356 /* action-clip only settings for active NLA-Strip */
00357 static void nla_panel_actclip(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00358 {
00359     PointerRNA strip_ptr;
00360     uiLayout *layout= pa->layout;
00361     uiLayout *column, *row;
00362     uiBlock *block;
00363 
00364     /* check context and also validity of pointer */
00365     if (!nla_panel_context(C, NULL, NULL, &strip_ptr))
00366         return;
00367     
00368     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00369     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_nla_region_buttons, NULL);
00370         
00371     /* Strip Properties ------------------------------------- */
00372     /* action pointer */
00373     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00374         uiItemR(row, &strip_ptr, "action", 0, NULL, ICON_ACTION);
00375         
00376     /* action extents */
00377     // XXX custom names were used here (to avoid the prefixes)... probably not necessary in future?
00378     column= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00379         uiItemL(column, "Action Extents:", ICON_NONE);
00380         uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "action_frame_start", 0, "Start Frame", ICON_NONE);
00381         uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "action_frame_end", 0, "End Frame", ICON_NONE);
00382         uiItemO(column, NULL, ICON_NONE, "NLA_OT_action_sync_length");
00383         
00384     /* action usage */
00385     column= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00386         uiLayoutSetActive(column, RNA_boolean_get(&strip_ptr, "use_animated_time")==0); 
00387         uiItemL(column, "Playback Settings:", ICON_NONE);
00388         uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "scale", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00389         uiItemR(column, &strip_ptr, "repeat", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00390 }

00392 /* evaluation settings for active NLA-Strip */
00393 static void nla_panel_evaluation(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00394 {
00395     PointerRNA strip_ptr;
00396     uiLayout *layout= pa->layout;
00397     uiLayout *col, *sub;
00398     uiBlock *block;
00399 
00400     /* check context and also validity of pointer */
00401     if (!nla_panel_context(C, NULL, NULL, &strip_ptr))
00402         return;
00403         
00404     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00405     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_nla_region_buttons, NULL);
00406         
00407     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00408     uiItemR(col, &strip_ptr, "use_animated_influence", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00409     
00410     sub= uiLayoutColumn(col, 1);
00411     uiLayoutSetEnabled(sub, RNA_boolean_get(&strip_ptr, "use_animated_influence")); 
00412     uiItemR(sub, &strip_ptr, "influence", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00413 
00414     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00415     sub= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
00416     uiItemR(sub, &strip_ptr, "use_animated_time", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00417     uiItemR(sub, &strip_ptr, "use_animated_time_cyclic", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00418 
00419     sub= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
00420     uiLayoutSetEnabled(sub, RNA_boolean_get(&strip_ptr, "use_animated_time"));
00421     uiItemR(sub, &strip_ptr, "strip_time", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00422 }
00423 
00424 /* F-Modifiers for active NLA-Strip */
00425 static void nla_panel_modifiers(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00426 {
00427     PointerRNA strip_ptr;
00428     NlaStrip *strip;
00429     FModifier *fcm;
00430     uiLayout *col, *row;
00431     uiBlock *block;
00432 
00433     /* check context and also validity of pointer */
00434     if (!nla_panel_context(C, NULL, NULL, &strip_ptr))
00435         return;
00436     strip= strip_ptr.data;
00437         
00438     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(pa->layout);
00439     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_nla_region_buttons, NULL);
00440     
00441     /* 'add modifier' button at top of panel */
00442     {
00443         row= uiLayoutRow(pa->layout, 0);
00444         block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00445         
00446         // XXX for now, this will be a operator button which calls a temporary 'add modifier' operator
00447         // FIXME: we need to set the only-active property so that this will only add modifiers for the active strip (not all selected)
00448         uiDefButO(block, BUT, "NLA_OT_fmodifier_add", WM_OP_INVOKE_REGION_WIN, IFACE_("Add Modifier"), 10, 0, 150, 20,
00449                 TIP_("Adds a new F-Modifier for the active NLA Strip"));
00450         
00451         /* copy/paste (as sub-row)*/
00452         row= uiLayoutRow(row, 1);
00453             uiItemO(row, "", ICON_COPYDOWN, "NLA_OT_fmodifier_copy");
00454             uiItemO(row, "", ICON_PASTEDOWN, "NLA_OT_fmodifier_paste");
00455     }
00456     
00457     /* draw each modifier */
00458     for (fcm= strip->modifiers.first; fcm; fcm= fcm->next) {
00459         col= uiLayoutColumn(pa->layout, 1);
00460         
00461         ANIM_uiTemplate_fmodifier_draw(col, strip_ptr.id.data, &strip->modifiers, fcm);
00462     }
00463 }

00467 
00468 void nla_buttons_register(ARegionType *art)
00469 {
00470     PanelType *pt;
00471     
00472     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype nla panel animdata");
00473     strcpy(pt->idname, "NLA_PT_animdata");
00474     strcpy(pt->label, "Animation Data");
00475     pt->draw= nla_panel_animdata;
00476     pt->poll= nla_animdata_panel_poll;
00477     pt->flag= PNL_DEFAULT_CLOSED;
00478     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00479     
00480     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype nla panel track");
00481     strcpy(pt->idname, "NLA_PT_track");
00482     strcpy(pt->label, "Active Track");
00483     pt->draw= nla_panel_track;
00484     pt->poll= nla_track_panel_poll;
00485     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00486     
00487     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype nla panel properties");
00488     strcpy(pt->idname, "NLA_PT_properties");
00489     strcpy(pt->label, "Active Strip");
00490     pt->draw= nla_panel_properties;
00491     pt->poll= nla_strip_panel_poll;
00492     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00493     
00494     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype nla panel properties");
00495     strcpy(pt->idname, "NLA_PT_actionclip");
00496     strcpy(pt->label, "Action Clip");
00497     pt->draw= nla_panel_actclip;
00498     pt->poll= nla_strip_actclip_panel_poll;
00499     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00500     
00501     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype nla panel evaluation");
00502     strcpy(pt->idname, "NLA_PT_evaluation");
00503     strcpy(pt->label, "Evaluation");
00504     pt->draw= nla_panel_evaluation;
00505     pt->poll= nla_strip_eval_panel_poll;
00506     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00507     
00508     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype nla panel modifiers");
00509     strcpy(pt->idname, "NLA_PT_modifiers");
00510     strcpy(pt->label, "Modifiers");
00511     pt->draw= nla_panel_modifiers;
00512     pt->poll= nla_strip_eval_panel_poll;
00513     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00514 }
00515 
00516 static int nla_properties(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00517 {
00518     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00519     ARegion *ar= nla_has_buttons_region(sa);
00520     
00521     if (ar)
00522         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
00523 
00524     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00525 }
00526 
00527 void NLA_OT_properties(wmOperatorType *ot)
00528 {
00529     ot->name = "Properties";
00530     ot->idname = "NLA_OT_properties";
00531     ot->description = "Toggle display properties panel";
00532     
00533     ot->exec = nla_properties;
00534     ot->poll = ED_operator_nla_active;
00535 
00536     /* flags */
00537     ot->flag = 0;
00538 }
